messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] I'm going to be out for the day
messages.msgSnippet: Have a nice time Sandra, I spend the whole of yesterday with my son and daughter in the National Rail Musuem. It has some amazing old steam engines from the
messages.messageBody:
Have a nice time Sandra, I spend the whole of yesterday with my son and
daughter in the National Rail Musuem. It has some amazing old steam engines
from the colonial era. awesome place DS loves it. The latter half we spent
in Delhi Craft Bazaar, which is all decked up and in festive spirit for the
ongoing Commonwealth Games, that New Delhi is hosting.

DD got her hair beaded and got Henna put on her palms. We ate a lot of
traditional food and watched tribal artists perform folk music and dances.

Dola

On Wed, Oct 6, 2010 at 7:32 PM, Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...> wrote:

>
>
> I'm going to the Natural History Museum with Holly and Clare, the girl
> she takes care of. I wasn't able to catch up with e-mail, so I hope
> I'm not ignoring anyone, and I hope other moderators will cover for
> me. I'll be out for seven hours or so, I think...
>
> What a nice list this has been lately. THANKS, for all the great
> posts and quality of thought.
>
> Sandra
>
>

messages.subject: I'm going to be out for the day
messages.msgSnippet: I m going to the Natural History Museum with Holly and Clare, the girl she takes care of.  I wasn t able to catch up with e-mail, so I hope I m not ignoring
messages.messageBody:
I'm going to the Natural History Museum with Holly and Clare, the girl
she takes care of. I wasn't able to catch up with e-mail, so I hope
I'm not ignoring anyone, and I hope other moderators will cover for
me. I'll be out for seven hours or so, I think...

What a nice list this has been lately. THANKS, for all the great
posts and quality of thought.

Sandra
